verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> which came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, when <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto him <S%H6583>Pashur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Melchiah<s%>, and <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1875>Inquire<s%>, I pray <S%H3068>you<s%>, of the Lord for <S%H1157>us<s%>; for <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> makes <S%H3898>war<s%> against <S%H3068>us<s%>; if so be that the Lord will <S%H6213>deal<s%> with us according to all his wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%>, that he may go up from <S%H5927>us<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus shall you say to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; <S%H5437>Behold<s%>, I will turn back the <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> that are in your <S%H3027>hands<s%>, with which you <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and against the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, which <S%H6696>besiege<s%> you <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%>, and I will <S%H622>assemble<s%> them into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of this <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And I myself will <S%H3898>fight<s%> against you with a <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, even in <S%H639>anger<s%>, and in <S%H2534>fury<s%>, and in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%>.

And I will <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of this <S%H5892>city<s%>, both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal<s%>: they shall <S%H4191>die<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>.

And <S%H310>afterward<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and such as are <S%H7604>left<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%> from the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, from the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and from the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life<s%>: and he shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; he shall not <S%H2347>spare<s%> <S%H2550>them<s%>, neither have pity, nor have <S%H7355>mercy<s%>.

And unto this <S%H5971>people<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I set <S%H6440>before<s%> you the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>, and the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>.

He that <S%H3427>stays<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and by the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>: but he that goes <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H5307>falls<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> that <S%H6696>besiege<s%> <S%H2421>you<s%>, he shall live, and his <S%H5315>life<s%> shall be unto him for a <S%H7998>prey<s%>.

For I have <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against this <S%H5892>city<s%> for <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and not for <S%H2896>good<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: it shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and he shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire<s%>.
And touching the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H8085>say<s%>, Hear you the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>;

O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H1777>Execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him that is <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6231>oppressor<s%>, lest my <S%H2534>fury<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H1197>burn<s%> that none can <S%H3518>quench<s%> <S%H6440>it<s%>, because of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings<s%>.

<S%H3427>Behold<s%>, I am against you, O inhabitant of the <S%H6010>valley<s%>, and <S%H6697>rock<s%> of the <S%H4334>plain<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; which <S%H559>say<s%>, Who shall come <S%H5181>down<s%> against <S%H935>us<s%>? or who shall enter into our <S%H4585>habitations<s%>?

But I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> you according to the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H3293>forest<s%> <S%H398>there<s%>, and it shall devour all things round about <S%H5439>it<s%>.
